Title: Relates to enacting the "Community Violence Intervention and Prevention Act"
Summary: Enacts the "Community Violence Intervention and Prevention Act"; provides findings for evidence-based and evidence-informed health programs from hospital-based and community-based programs.
LawCode: Add Art 22-A §§637-a - 637-c, Exec L; add §97-bbbbb, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the state finance law, in relation to enacting the "community violence intervention and prevention act"
